titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Rice University Ad hoc and Other Committees Records UA 306
titlestmt.author: Shannon Kelly, Norie Guthrie

publicationstmt.publisher: Woodson Research Center, Rice University, Houston, Texas

note.p: Stored off-site at the Library Service Center and requires 24-hour notice for retrieval. Please contact the Woodson Research Center at 713-348-2586 or woodson@rice.edu for more information.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-04-02 13:12:02 -0500.

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.corpname: Woodson Research Center, Rice University, Houston, Texas

did.unittitle: Rice University Ad hoc and Other Committees Records
did.abstract: Minutes and notes representing the work of ad hoc and other committees at Rice University.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Ad hoc committees at Rice University for short term processes at the university.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Minutes and notes representing the work of ad hoc and other committees at Rice University.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to this restricted material requires written permission from the Rice University Vice President for Admininistration Office.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Stored off-site at the Library Service Center and requires 24-hour notice for retrieval. Please contact the Woodson Research Center at 713-348-2586 or woodson@rice.edu for more information.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: This materials has been transferred from within the university over time.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Rice University Ad hoc and Other Committees Records, 1946-1998, UA 306, Woodson Research Center, Fondren Library, Rice University.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from this material must be facilitated through the Woodson Research Center, woodson@rice.edu.

The Woodson Research Center use policy is that researchers assume sole responsibility for any infringement of privacy, literary rights, copyrights, or other rights arising from their use of the archival materials. In addition to any restrictions placed by donors, certain kinds of archival materials are restricted for the life of the creator plus 50 years. These materials include, but are not limited to, student grades, transcripts, and any job applications or recommendations.
